extendedInfo.description: This is a trial version of Snap Camera.It has all the features of the paid app but will only start if your device doesn't have an internet connection.Enable airplane mode (or disable all data connections) to use this trial app so you can decide if you want to buy it.The best possible camera experience with regular updates and new features added all the time.Snap Camera lets you take pictures and record video with a single click, no cluttered preview screen, just the two buttons you really need. Snap Camera's interface is based on the camera included in Android 4.2 (jelly bean) on the Nexus 4 but with many extra features.Snap Camera has a simple, powerful user interface featuring:  * Touch to focus * Pinch to zoom * Swipe to review * Long press to adjust photo settings with the photo controller. The photo controller includes settings for: * Colour and Contrast (if supported by the hardware). * Silent Shutter * Burst Mode * Self Timer * Panorama mode * Flash mode * Whitebalance * Exposure * Grid lines * Fast picture mode * HDR * Additional SettingsThe additional settings menu gives you access to many extra settings. * Picture and Video Size * Scene mode * Self Timer delay * Burst Mode settings * Time Lapse * Still and Video Focus Modes * JPEG Quality * Effects * ISO  * Anti-banding * Scene Detection * Video Bitrate  * Audio SettingsThe photo editor lets you: * Add colour effects * Add a border * Crop, Rotate, Mirror * Straighten * Add image effects * Histogram Modification * VignetteAdditional Features - You can see what effects will be applied and undo an effect at any time from the history menu- Share an image with any other app such as Facebook or Google+ by clicking on the share icon- Create panoramas by selecting the panorama icon (Android 4.0 and above)- Fast picture mode instantly captures photos at the preview resolution.- Capture still snapshots during video recording (if supported)- Use the volume buttons to focus and take a picture- Auto torch mode for low light video recording- Use the advanced video settings to record video in resolutions not allowed by other cameras. For example, this gives you 720p video recording on the Nexus 7.High Dynamic Range (HDR)HDR is a feature that lets you take pictures of scenes with very dark and/or very light areas. Swipe up on the controller to enable HDR mode. The app takes two photos at different exposures and combines them to make one HDR photo.See here for details of HDR:http://marginz.co.nz/index.html#HDRHDR mode is still experimental and only supported on ARMv7 devices with NEON, let us know if it doesn't work well on your device.Snap works best on newer phones but will still run on older models.Some features are only available on phones that support them. Camera apps are notoriously difficult to make compatible with all hardware.Please install and test the trial version first before you buy the paid app.The trial version has all the features of the paid app but will only start in Airplane mode.Please visit our website for tips and more details about the settings and features. There is a discussion forum here:http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2055140Please use this to report bugs, ask questions and suggest new features.This app will install 2 icons in your launcher, one for the Gallery and one for the Camera. Some launchers also put the Gallery icon on your home screen.If video recording does't work on your device, try these suggestions:http://marginz.co.nz/index.html#videofailIf the preview doesn't display correctly try enabling safe mode:http://marginz.co.nz/index.html#safeCheck out our great video to see Snap Camera in action.

reviews.title: Beyond brilliant!!!
reviews.comment: Have tried EVERY camera app on my Optimus G, this is far and away the best. Gallery is SO much better than my standard one, and the editor rivals the big names. Bravo, bought the paid version without a second thought.
reviews.author: Rachel Beinish

reviews.title: Feature-packed
reviews.comment: HDR, burst shots, etc. SNAP Camera packs with a lot of useful features!   - Awesome camera app!
reviews.author: Keith OYS

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: 5stars.
reviews.author: Rose Nude

reviews.title: Maybe I\'m missing something...
reviews.comment: HDR just places 3 exact images in the gallery.  Exposure adjustment doesn\'t appear to do anything.

reviews.title: I don\'t always rate apps....
reviews.comment: But when I do...they rock my socks!!! This app is what stock cameras should be. I\'ve always liked my phones camera but this opens up a whole new world. Excellent! Now off to buy the full version!!
reviews.author: Penny Fletcher

reviews.title: Note 2. Rooted.
reviews.comment: So far so good. Quick good pics. Better contrast, better color then stock android. Was almost leaning back to TW over AOSP. Well see how this goes first. Snap gallery can use a little more custom views - No thumbnails or list form.. Etc. Oh and NOISE REDUCTION!!!
reviews.author: Billy Mog

reviews.title: Crash!!!
reviews.comment: Maybe it\'s a trial or something else, it crashes everytime I click a picture..   Please fix this for my Sony Xperia s.. :(
reviews.author: Sid Shak

reviews.title: Incompatible with my device
reviews.comment: The photo app is nice,simple,and fast But when i tried to use video recording,the app is force closed..

reviews.title: 5 stars!!!
reviews.comment: I was waiting for a FiLMiC Pro like video recording app for Android. Finally this is it!!! Thank you guys!!!

reviews.title: Good app design.
reviews.comment: But HDR is crude tone mapping doesn\'t take photos at different exposures. Wish HDR was as good as HDR+ then this would be my goto app
reviews.author: Adrian Gonsalves

reviews.title: Great potential, lacking in execution.
reviews.comment: Compared to modified aosp cameras in xda this app does not really offer anything extra. Whilst its nice to see so many options many do not really work. It be nice to have options hidden that your phone does not support.   I like the quick access to different camera modes though.   Thank you for offering a free trial as I\'d of been quite dissapointed if I bought the app.  Remove the HDR option though as its a waste of time and just looks noisy and washed out.   Kudos for giving us all another choice though.
reviews.author: Joseph Deally

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Been using this app for some time now and i don\'t have any issues..there\'s occasional stutters and lags but it doesn\'t bother me..Hope the dev could add a quick capture feature and let us be able to take picture while recording a video on the paid version just like the sony camera app on jb...Prefer this over my stock sony camera app as i like the ui of snap camera very much..Hope the dev would take this into consideration..
reviews.author: Mohd HaiCurL
